name: Big Hunter 3D
description:
Watch out big hunters! Monster incoming! Time to call all your buddies to fight against these monsters!

◆Never fight alone

You will fight with 3 other hunters, so try to use your special abilities and defeat different BOSS

◆Easy but addictive controlling experience

One finger control, slide the screen to move, release to attack. Every weapon has different ways to attack, experience changes when you use different weapons!

◆Collect tons of skins&customizations

Get bankfull diamonds after defeat BOSS, purchase your favourite skins and customizations, make your own best hunters ever!
